---
title: "log2 gene abundance vs gene count QC plot"
output: html_notebook
---

## Modification of original script by Dr Venturini
## Quick QC to check that gene abundance distribution looks normal

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
dataNormal <- read_csv("path/to/log2/gene/abundance.csv")
dataNormal_long <- data %>% pivot_longer(!target, names_to = "sample", values_to = "log2_tpm")
dataNormal_long$sample <- as.factor(dataNormal_long$sample)
```



```{r}
qcNormal <- ggplot(dataNormal_long$GSM2545093,aes(log2_tpm)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~sample) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "Gene count", 
       x = "log2 signal intensity/TPM")

qcNormal + ylim(0,1000)
```
